医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
地中海饮食和 MIND 饮食可增强中年记忆力地中海饮食和 MIND 饮食可能通过膳食纤维和有益肠道细菌与中年情景和视觉空间工作记忆的保存有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Mediterranean-and-MIND-diets-boost-memory-retention-in-midlife.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Mediterranean-and-MIND-diets-boost-memory-retention-in-midlife.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5caa1fe-2bea-4b98-9f3f-91bf1fb663f6 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 18:03:00 -0500 Mediterranean and MIND diets boost memory retention in midlife
提高健康水平可降低前列腺癌风险一项针对瑞典男性的研究发现，随着时间的推移，提高心肺健康（CRF）与降低前列腺癌发病风险相关，这凸显了改善健康对预防这种疾病的潜在保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Boosting-fitness-levels-linked-to-lower-prostate-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Boosting-fitness-levels-linked-to-lower-prostate-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57868a77-15ec-456e-8077-1145c6588a40 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 17:36:00 -0500 Boosting fitness levels linked to lower prostate cancer risk
高质量的早期饮食可降低儿童 IBD 风险生命早期的饮食，尤其是一岁时的高质量饮食和鱼类摄入量，与儿童患炎症性肠病（IBD）的风险较低有关，这凸显了婴儿期饮食选择的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/High-quality-early-diet-linked-to-lower-IBD-risk-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/High-quality-early-diet-linked-to-lower-IBD-risk-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2a90cae-ca7b-4712-9739-e9f6969e4872 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 17:26:00 -0500 High-quality early diet linked to lower IBD risk in children
研究发现，母亲怀孕期间的幸福感可以促进孩子的大脑发育怀孕期间母亲的幸福感与女儿海马体体积的增大以及 7.5 岁时儿童大脑连接的改变有关，这表明积极的情绪可能会促进胎儿的大脑发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Maternal-happiness-in-pregnancy-boosts-child-brain-development-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Maternal-happiness-in-pregnancy-boosts-child-brain-development-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=672a8cc9-82dc-4555-8cf1-37d7591803fe Mon, 05 Feb 2024 17:17:00 -0500 Maternal happiness in pregnancy boosts child brain development, study finds
研究人员确定了神经细胞中血清素运输的基本原理抗抑郁药以神经细胞中的血清素转运蛋白为目标，是全世界最常用的处方药之一，但有时会产生严重的副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Researchers-identify-the-basic-principles-of-serotonin-transport-in-nerve-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Researchers-identify-the-basic-principles-of-serotonin-transport-in-nerve-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd81716a-fbe3-43d6-a3de-1e48c7e37604 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 13:24:59 -0500 Researchers identify the basic principles of serotonin transport in nerve cells
青少年欺凌与低脑谷氨酸、早期精神病症状有关研究人员发现，被同龄人欺负的青少年在早期阶段出现精神病的风险更大，反过来，大脑中负责调节情绪的部分的关键神经递质水平也会降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Teenage-bullying-linked-to-lower-brain-glutamate-early-psychosis-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Teenage-bullying-linked-to-lower-brain-glutamate-early-psychosis-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13dbddf1-334d-40f5-bfb9-6aa45fdbd7c0 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 13:14:00 -0500 Teenage bullying linked to lower brain glutamate, early psychosis symptoms
萨里大学的新研究设施很快就能解开疾病的秘密萨里大学的一个新研究设施很快就能帮助社会更好地了解各种疾病，甚至可以帮助科学家通过人类和动物的身体和细胞追踪纳米塑料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-research-facility-at-the-University-of-Surrey-could-soon-unlock-the-secrets-of-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-research-facility-at-the-University-of-Surrey-could-soon-unlock-the-secrets-of-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f6fd421-ebad-4567-af72-85f925f26b96 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 13:07:58 -0500 New research facility at the University of Surrey could soon unlock the secrets of diseases
具有内置抗菌膜和抗氧化功能的水凝胶可促进感染的慢性伤口更快愈合最近开发了一种新型水凝胶敷料来对抗这些不良特性，并测试了其对糖尿病感染伤口愈合的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Hydrogel-with-built-in-antibiofilm-and-antibiotic-functions-promotes-faster-healing-of-infected-chronic-wounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Hydrogel-with-built-in-antibiofilm-and-antibiotic-functions-promotes-faster-healing-of-infected-chronic-wounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=623282b1-153a-44e0-8e2a-785effd6830b Mon, 05 Feb 2024 13:02:00 -0500 Hydrogel with built-in antibiofilm and antioxidative functions promotes faster healing of infected chronic wounds
新的减肥药可能是预防或治疗高血压的有效策略根据今天发表在美国心脏协会《高血压》杂志上的一项新研究，新型减肥药物替泽帕肽显着降低了近 500 名服用该药物约八个月的肥胖成年人的收缩压（血压读数中的最高数字）杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-weight-loss-drug-may-be-an- effective-strategy-for-preventing-or-treating-high-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-weight-loss-drug-may-be-an- effective-strategy-for-preventing-or-treating-high-blood-压.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d8fda7b-9a2f-4814-be54-f83e60b07f1a Mon, 05 Feb 2024 12:52:52 -0500 New weight loss drug may be an effective strategy for preventing or treating high blood pressure
研究：大多数新处方药首先在美国销售根据兰德公司的一份新报告，大多数新处方药首先在美国销售，然后再到达其他国家，但最终重要的药物在首次销售后大约一年内就会在大多数富裕国家销售。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Study-Most-new-prescription-drugs-sold-first-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Study-Most-new-prescription-drugs-sold-first-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=721a4857-5a18-44cc-a41b-6c3a71ee19c2 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 12:44:00 -0500 Study: Most new prescription drugs sold first in the U.S.
